body: This is one if not among the best artist i ever laid my eyes on. Like just seeing the artist name or the cover i know the art style is gonna be good. Wish the artist do even non-h mangas. The anatomy and facial expressions are always majestic as fuck
Honestly, the action in this is done pretty well.
This was so good wtf, a gem

I didn't even need to read title or tags, I saw the style of the cover and instant favorite. I already probably read everything in this, but it doesn't matter, as far as femdom goes, Kabuki is legendary, right up there with Dhibi
Holy shit, can't believe this finally got translated. Wonder if the last big work of kabuki will get translated as well.
